channel.description: How do I make my server automatically restart/update after a certain period of time?

item.title: [PI]Server Auto Restarter[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:2, topic:389042”]You need to get an autorestarter, most sources come with one. I suggest you use the search bar. Or you could write code to time how long the server has been running for and then restart it when you please but I’m sure an auto restarter would be a much better way at doing it.

Most autorestarters have an easy to use GUI.[/quote]
I searched through 5 pages of posts and only found one, and it didn’t even work successfully…
